Reason: The 'tracetype_repair_ttl' configuration is performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly impacts the TTL for repair tracing sessions, which can affect the amount of storage space required for tracing data. Additionally, the TTL value set for repair tracing sessions can lead to notable performance variations at the system level by affecting the duration for which tracing data is retained.
